author: Fextralife
description:
The Outer Worlds 2 Gameplay FIRST LOOK - Can Obsidian Get Their Groove Back?
In this Fextralife video, we're going to be taking a look at The Outer Worlds 2. This was a game that was announced last year, and they showed off some gameplay recently at Developer Direct. We were right in the middle of Nightreign when that happened, so I didn't have time to get around to covering it. So now that things have kind of slowed down there, I'm getting into taking a look at this game. But in this video, we're going to talk about what they announced, what they showed in the gameplay and what our expectations are for this game.

title: The Outer Worlds 2 Gameplay FIRST LOOK - Can Obsidian Get Their Groove Back?
